channel.title: Pimpscape.. max level cap
channel.description:
Well I am having troubles with the max level of a character. For some reason on pimpscape the lvl 126 rule does not apply.. yes summoning has been removed. So does anyone know how I could add a level cap? :|
thanks, Lkcthereturn

item.title: Pimpscape.. max level cap
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

So does anyone know how to create a combat cap…
Or fix mine so it doesn’t go over 126, I do not have summoning so why does the combat level go over 126?

#Edit: I already have the max level cap of the skills set to 99, but still I get 185 combat =o

Read full topic

item.title: Pimpscape.. max level cap
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:6, topic:324524”][quote author=LKCTheReturn link=topic=420919.msg3091476#msg3091476 date=1262919121]
that is for max skill level, the combat level will go up to 185 >.<
[/quote]

Most servers skill-level is actually dont through a mathmatical method through the Skills, so there is no return cap. What you would be looking for is, lets say, your max skill level was 155, you would search:

return 155;

Until you see this: (still saying max skill levl is 155)

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 155; lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
					* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
			output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
			if (output >= exp) {
				return lvl;
			}
		}
		return 155;

Change both 155’s to 99, so it looks like this:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 99; [/quote]

max level (combat) still comes out to being 185 o.o

Read full topic

item.title: Pimpscape.. max level cap
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

LKCTheReturn:

that is for max skill level, the combat level will go up to 185 >.<

Most servers skill-level is actually dont through a mathmatical method through the Skills, so there is no return cap. What you would be looking for is, lets say, your max skill level was 155, you would search:

return 155;

Until you see this: (still saying max skill levl is 155)

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 155; lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
					* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
			output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
			if (output >= exp) {
				return lvl;
			}
		}
		return 155;

Change both 155’s to 99, so it looks like this:

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
					* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
			output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
			if (output >= exp) {
				return lvl;
			}
		}
		return 99;
